value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

images.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms

value.title: Introduction to machine learning with Python and Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Python has become a dominant language for doing data analysis with machine learning. Learn how to leverage Python and associated libraries in Jupyter Notebooks run on Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends.

topItems.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

topItems.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
topItems.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

topItems.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
topItems.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Manage cloud resources
value.excerpt:
Learn more about how the cloud works by exploring it's underlying technology of virtualization, how to take advantage of the cloud for scale, and how to automate cloud resource management.
In this learning path, you will:

Learn about virtualization and how it's used in the cloud
Know what VMs and containers are
Understand what scale, load, and common load patterns are
Know what autoscaling is and be familiar with autoscaling techniques
Learn how to automate cloud resource management with scripts
Understand the concept of infrastructure-as-code

In Partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Understand virtualization
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

topItems.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity
topItems.excerpt: Discover what cloud elasticity means and different ways to scale your cloud resources.

images.title: Scale your cloud resources with elasticity

topItems.title: Automate cloud resource management
topItems.excerpt: Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

images.title: Automate cloud resource management

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Add your custom domain to Azure Active Directory. Add DNS information to the domain registrar. Verify your custom domain name in the Azure portal and set it as the primary.

images.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: In manufacturing, decision-makers must take into account specific industry considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI in the enterprise. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing

value.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources
value.excerpt: Securely authenticate applications to Azure to manage and access Azure services. Service principals and managed identities for Azure resources give your app an Azure Active Directory identity.

images.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Azure Container Registry is a managed Docker registry service based on the open-source Docker Registry 2.0. Container Registry is private, hosted in Azure, and allows you to build, store, and manage images for all types of container deployments. Learn how to build and store container images with Azure Container Registry.

images.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

images.title: Monitor cloud resources

value.title: Automate cloud resource management
value.excerpt: Learn about how to automate cloud resource management with scripts and infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform.

images.title: Automate cloud resource management

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Create and manipulate tables using the datascience library
value.excerpt: Learn the basics of table manipulation in the datascience library.

images.title: Create and manipulate tables using the datascience library

value.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

images.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines

value.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
value.excerpt: Deploy a pre-built temperature simulator module to the edge using a container. The pre-built module will be deployed to an IoT edge device. You will check that the module was successfully created and deployed to the edge. You will view the simulated data from the deployed module.

images.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

images.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure

value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service
value.excerpt: A successful AI strategy in customer service must consider cultural issues, as well as business issues. The goal of this module is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS

value.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights
value.excerpt: Obtain comprehensive diagnostic information from a web app by adding the Application Insights SDK to your server-side code.

images.title: Instrument server-side web application code with Application Insights

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

images.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure

value.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library
value.excerpt: Learn about programming and data types in Python

images.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library

value.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.title: Manage site reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

images.title: Manage site reliability

value.title: Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: This module covers the basics of how to use the Cloud Adoption Frameworkâ€”a set of documentation, implementation guidance, best practices, and tools that aid in aligning the strategy for business, people, and technology.

images.title: Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure

value.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies
value.excerpt: Learn how to measure the throughput of your NoSQL database and assess the impact of partition key and indexing strategies on throughput.

images.title: Optimize the performance of Azure Cosmos DB by using partitioning and indexing strategies

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Discover the tools available to detect and correct problems with your Azure Storage to enable your cloud storage infrastructure to operate at peak performance.

images.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: Work with files and directories in a Node.js app
value.excerpt: Build an app that manipulates files and directories with Node.js.

value.title: Protect your APIs on Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Protect your back-end APIs from information exposure and implement throttling to prevent resource exhaustion with policies in Azure API Management.
